attributes.action: Vaccinate all third world countries in 2022 for covid 19.
attributes.additional_details:
Third world countries need support to vaccinate their populations. They neither have the vaccines or health professionals to offer a covid 19 shot to everyone.
The UK needs to lead this in 2022 otherwise we’ll be in this dire situation indefinitely with many more unnecessary deaths.
attributes.background: Lead the way globally in delivering vaccines and and support from health professionals to all third world countries in 2022. The pandemic will continue with all of the current uncertainties until we address the problem globally.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596403
